column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Haven't been for a couple of years.  Went after Black Friday sales so got there about 10:30.  Was told it would be a 30 minute wait.  Based on previous experience we thought it was worth it.  Was seated in about 20 minutes.  We ordered skillets
column3: pancakes and lattes.  All of it was perfect.  Waiter was friendly and helpful.  If I had to find any fault and that would be their eagerness to clear the table.  That's understandable when you have a queue of 30 people waiting.
